mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ta_point (point_name, remarks_name, point_type, point_unit, block_no,file_relative_path,file_prefix_name, state, init_date, init_user, mod_date, mod_user) VALUES (#{pointName}, #{remarksName}, #{pointType}, #{pointUnit}, #{blockNo},#{fileRelativePath},#{filePrefixName}, #{state}, now(), #{initUser}, now(), #{modUser});

update ta_point set remarks_name = #{remarksName}, point_type = #{pointType}, point_unit = #{pointUnit}, block_no = #{blockNo}, file_relative_path = #{fileRelativePath}, file_prefix_name = #{filePrefixName}, mod_date=now(), mod_user = #{modUser} where point_id = #{pointId}
mapper.select: select point_id as pointId, point_name as pointName, remarks_name as remarksName, point_type as pointType, point_unit as pointUnit, block_no as blockNo, file_relative_path as fileRelativePath, file_prefix_name as filePrefixName from ta_point where state = 1 and point_name = #{point_name}

select point_id as pointId, point_name as pointName, remarks_name as remarksName, point_type as pointType, point_unit as pointUnit, block_no as blockNo, file_relative_path as fileRelativePath, file_prefix_name as filePrefixName from ta_point where state = 1 and point_id = #{point_id}

select * from ta_point where state = 1
and point_name like CONCAT('%',#{point_name},'%')
and remarks_name like CONCAT('%',#{remarks_name},'%')
and point_type = #{point_type}
order by point_id desc
select * from ta_point where state = 1 and point_id in (${pointIds}) order by point_name asc
select * from ta_point where state = 1 and point_name like CONCAT('%',#{point_name},'%') order by point_name asc
select * from ta_point where state = 1 and point_name like CONCAT('%',#{remarks_name},'%') order by point_name asc
select t.file_relative_path ,t.file_prefix_name from ta_point t where t.state = 1 order by t.file_relative_path,t.file_prefix_name
